root.name: Akatsuki Blitzkampf
root.description: Characters Akatsuki: An ex-military officer of the Imperial Army. Akatsuki was believed to have died in battle in the Artic ocean. Many decades later, he returns with new abilities and power to finish his mission. Akatsuki Mycale: From the secret society "Gessellschaft", Mycale is a witch, she predates the Middle Ages. She is on a mission to find a secret weapon Mycale Sai Kanae Fritz Marlyn Sue Wei Anonym Elekrtosoldat Blitztank Alder Murakumo
